google chrome: Press enter to send the prompt.
In the plan, specify using the "website's search box", not the browser's, except when searching via URL.
Ensure the plan explicitly specifies "Website search bar" or "Browser search bar", never just "search bar" alone.
After logging into the MixKit website, click on Stock Video to enter the video download interface.
There are many video thumbnails on the mixkit website. If you want to download, first click on the thumbnail of the video
